channel.title: Yirggzmb's Stuff
channel.description: Yirggzmb's personal website, assorted video game and craft stuff

item.title: Critterpedia Field Journal
item.description: Added a page for the Animal Crossing real world Critterpedia I created. This page features both photos of mine, as well as files and information about making one yourself.

item.title: Jack-o-Lantern Gallery
item.description: Added a section for misc art and a gallery of Jack-o-Lanterns I've done over the years.

item.title: Tiny Life
item.description: Added a section for Tiny Life creations.

item.title: Custom Designs - Wild World
item.description: Here are a selection of custom designs created in Wild World. The only way to get them is to recreate them yourself in game. These may also be useful in other games, however the color palettes there are different and you may have to tinker. Click on any image to see it larger. Each design will have, at minimum, a screenshot of the design in the designer with and without the grid. There will also likely be at least one image with the design using an alternative palette, so as to make the specific colors more clear which is used where. Where possible, I've also added screenshots or photos of the designs used in game, some in emulator and others photos of my actual DS.

item.title: Red Heart Granny all in one Square Yarn Experiment
item.description: I'm fascinated by novelty yarns, especially the kind where it's something they're doing with color rather than texture. So while I knew going in that this "make a many color granny square without having to change yarns" idea was going to be a bit futzy, I was really curious JUST how annoying it would be. So here is a log of my attempt and general thoughts.
